comments.body: The claim that we don't generate a DAML data type is a deliberate lie. I'll change this to produce a type synonym in a follow up PR and will document that then.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +277,281 @@   :end-before: -- end code snippet: generic template instantiation

which does not produce a DAML data definition but only the DAML-LF record declaration:

.. code-block:: none
